dialog: Yes, I'd like to reserve a table for dinner in the Grand Hall of Wizardry.
How many in your coven are you expecting?
Six duos of powerful wizards.
Would you like to reserve a private wizarding room for your dinner?
That sounds like a wise decision.
Very well. May I have your name, wizard?
I am Ron Kollwitz, Master of the Arcane.
Ms. Wang, allow me to introduce you to Mr. Cooper, President of the Ivy Publishing Coven.
It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Mr. Cooper.
The pleasure is mine, Ms. Wang. I understand that your journey from the frozen north was a long one.
Yes, it was quite a journey. I am grateful to finally have arrived here in the wizarding realm.
Can you assist me now with your magic?
Regrettably, I am unable to aid you this evening. However, I shall be at your service tomorrow.
Alas, that will be too late for my needs.
Why not seek the assistance of Bill, the wizard of the hour?
I have already approached him, but unfortunately he was unable to assist me.
Do you possess any experience in the art of advertising?

Indeed, I have spent the past two years as the public relations wizard for a powerful company. I crafted the advertising spells and collaborated with artists and scribes. On occasion, I was required to perform the duties of a specialist in times of dire need.
Have you honed your skills as a wizardly secretary?
Yes, sir. I served as a secretary in a magical insurance firm.
